entry.name: Bioinformatics analysis of a Saccharomyces cerevisiae N-terminal proteome provides evidence of alternative translation initiation and post-translational N-terminal acetylation.
entry.description: PRIDE ID: 16442. Data published as part of J Proteome Res. 2011 10:3578-89 ([[http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/21619078 PubMed]]). From the Abstract: {{/i}}By applying N-terminal COFRADIC (combined fractional diagonal chromatography), we here isolated N-terminal peptides of a Saccharomyces cerevisiae proteome and analyzed both annotated and alternative TIS.{{/i}}

additional_fields.field: Computational Omics and Systems Biology Group, Department of Medical Protein Research, Universiteit Gent - VIB
